column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------Â A man attempted suicide by jumping off the Chroy Changvar bridge
column4: but changed his mind when in the water.------The incident occurred at 11:20 am on March 9
column6: on the bridge in Daun Penh district.------The man
column9: had earlier walked on the Chroy Changva bridge from the west
column10: climbed over the railings and leapt into the water.------Another report says he suffered from depression and his wife had recently filed for a divorce.------Once in the water
column11: he swam to the foot of the bridge and held on. A boat then went out to rescue him and bring him back to dry land. ------TVFB
